ValidationRule.description: The Backend Id is required before closing QC case as successful
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((RecordType.DeveloperName = "AT_Internal_Case" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "SE_Internal_Case") && ISPICKVAL(Type, "Quality Check") && ISPICKVAL( Closed_Reason__c , "Successful") && ISBLANK(Account.Backend_ID__c)) || (RecordType.DeveloperName = "FI_Entry_Case" && ISPICKVAL(Type, "Menu Processing") && ISPICKVAL( Closed_Reason__c , "Take Online") && ISBLANK(Account.Backend_ID__c)) && $User.ProfileId <> '00ew0000001HfA4AAK'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Backend ID in the Account before closing the case.
